item.title: Added information about BotFront
item.description: https://botfront.net/ - Free CDN and DDoS protection for one domain and three subdomains

item.title: Added Protectumus Website Security Scanner
item.description: https://protectumus.com) - Free website security check, site antivirus and server firewall (WAF - Free website security check, site antivirus and server firewall (WAF). Email and SMS notifications for registered users.

item.title: Added Slab
item.description: https://slab.com/ - A modern knowledge management service for teams. Free for up to 10 users.

item.title: added new services IP Geo Loaction and CurrencyFreaks
item.description:
https://ipgeolocation.io/ - — Free DEVELOPER plan available with 30K requests/month.
https://currencyfreaks.com/ - Provides current and historical currency exchange rates. Free DEVELOPER plan available with 1000 requests/month.

item.title: Updates to QuickMocker free features and quotas
item.description: https://quickmocker.com/) — Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, more than 100 shortcodes (dynamic or fake response values - Manage online fake API endpoints under your own subdomain, forward requests to localhost URL for webhooks development and testing, use RegExp and multiple HTTP methods for URL path, prioritize endpoints, more than 100 shortcodes (dynamic or fake response values) for response templating, proxy requests, restrict endpoint by IP address and authorization header. Free account provides 1 random subdomain, 10 endpoints, 5 RegExp URL paths, 50 shortcodes per endpoint, 100 requests per day, 50 history records in requests log.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://openapidesigner.com/ - — Visually create Open API 3 definitions for free.

item.title: Added DNS from F5
item.description: https://www.f5.com/products/ways-to-deploy/cloud-services/dns-cloud-service - Free Anycast DNS hosting for primary zones. And free for secondary zones up to 1 domain and 3 million requests per month.

item.title: Added Boxysvg in Design and UI
item.description: https://boxy-svg.com/app - A free installable Web app for drawing SVGs and exporting in svg,png,jpeg an other formats.
